summary: This document is a detailed index of discovery materials produced to the defense in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330). It lists hundreds of items including FBI interview reports (302s), police reports, deposition transcripts, grand jury transcripts, emails, notes, and other evidence, covering a period from 1995 to 2021. The index is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330) for which this discovery index was produced.

events.description: Grand jury transcript referenced in multiple discovery entries (e.g., 3504-036, 3509-016, 3510-003, 3513-024, 3513-029, 3516-004, 3523-020, 3523-022).

events.description: Grand jury transcript or presentation referenced in discovery entries (3504-038, 3505-085, 3513-029, 3516-004, 3523-022).

events.description: Multiple Palm Beach Police reports, recordings, and sworn statements from late 2005 and 2006 related to the investigation (listed in 3504 series).

events.title: Deposition and Exhibits
events.description: Multiple deposition transcripts and exhibits from June 2016 (3504-023 to 3504-030, 3523-006 to 3523-015).

events.title: FBI Interview

keyFacts: This is an extensive discovery index for U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell, listing over 500 items produced to the defense by November 11, 2021.

The materials span from 1995 to 2021 and include critical evidence like Palm Beach Police reports from 2005-2006, FBI 302 interview reports, grand jury transcripts from 2020 and 2021, and numerous depositions.
The index references flight logs (3523-026, 3523-027), which are often cited in the Epstein case for tracking travel of associates and alleged victims.
Multiple proffer agreements are listed (e.g., 3523-017, 3524-015, 3524-019, 3524-025, 3527-008, 3527-011), indicating cooperation negotiations between witnesses and prosecutors.
The document is subject to a protective order restricting disclosure, as noted in the header and footer of each page.
